Sims bụ ónyé édémédé America amaara màkà usoro Brotherman nke akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị.  Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na nwanne ya nwoke, ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri Dawud Anyabwile. N'afọ 2015, ọ gbanwere akwụkwọ Walter Dean Myers bụ Monster ka ọ bụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Anyabwile sere.

N'afọ 2017, ụmụnne ahụ na Mahadum Emory rụkọtara ọrụ iji mepụta Big City Map Project nké mepụtara ụwa nkè eziokwu (VR) màkà ederede nke usoro Brotherman. A na-echekwa Brotherman Comics na ihe ncheta ndị metụtara ya na National Museum of African American History & Culture.

A mụrụ Sims na Philadelphia n'aka Edward Sims Jr., prọfesọ na-ahụ màkà mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibè ya na Deanna Jones-Sims, onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze. Ọ bi na Blacksburg, Virginia, ya na nwunye ya na ụmụ atọ.
